promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare fox normal-type pokemon with a white tail. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or fox. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Vulpillow, a a chibi cute rare fox normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Fastwave. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fox", "normal" or "Vulpillow". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, fox-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive critter, Vulpillow, thrives in quaint hamlets. With its Fastwave ability, it zips through daily life in cute yet swift motions.
